definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: (NH id. Pt. pass. [[בהול]] disquieted; Pi. disquiet; Targum Pa. [[בַּהֵיל]] hasten, be precipitate, also dismay: but bhel is be quiet)—

be disturbed, dismayed, terrified, Ge 45:3 (E) Ju Jdg 20:41, 1Sa 28:21, 2Sa 4:1 (‖[[וַיִּרְפּוּ]] [[יׇדָיו]], cf. Ez Eze 7:27 supr.); of bones of sufferer Ps 6:3 (‖ cf. infr. v:Ps 6:4); of hands of dismayed people Ez Eze 7:27; esp. at chastisements & judgments of ´[[י]] Ex 15:15 (song, in E) Ps 6:4 (subj. [[נֶפֶשׁ]], ‖ cf. supr. v:Ps 6:3) v:Ps 6:10 (‖[[בושׁ]]) Ps 30:8; cf. Ps 104:29; Ps 83:18 (‖[[בושׁ]]) Ps 90:7, Is 13:8, Is 21:3 (sq. [[מִן]] of occasion of fear) Job 23:15 (id.) Je 51:32, Ez Eze 26:18 (del. LXX Co); Job 4:5 (‖[[לאה]]), cf. also Job 21:6 as adj. terrible Zep 1:18 [[כָּלָה אַח־נִבְהָלָה]].
be in haste, hasty (late, cf. Aram. above): Ec 8:3 [[מִפָּנׇיו תֵּלֵח]] ´[[אַל־תִּבּ]] be not hasty (to) go from him; Pr 28:22 [[נִבֳהָל לַהוֹן]] hastening after riches.

hasten, make haste, act hastily (late), 2Ch 35:21 [[וֵאלֽהִים אָמַר לְבַהֲלֵנִי]] God hath given command to speed me (RVm); sq. inf. make haste Es 2:9; of hasty speech Ec 5:1 ´[[אַל־תְּב]] [[עַל־פִּיךָ]] (‖[[וְלִבְּךָ אַל־יְמַהֵר לְהוֹחִיא דָבָר]]); of anger Ec 7:9 [[בְּרוּחֲךָ לִכְעוֹס]] ´[[אַל־תְּב]].

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. pl. [[מְבׂהָלִים]] Es 8:14, cf. [[מְבׂהֶלֶת]] Qr Pr 20:21 (so rd. with Vrss Now Str; AV RV); Kt [[מבחלת]] v. [[בחל]];—hastened Es 8:14 of royal posts (‖[[דְּחוּפִים]]); hastily gained ´[[נַחֲלָה מְב]] Pr 20:21.
dismay, terrify, sq. sf. Job 23:16 (subj. [[שַׁדַּי]]; ‖[[הֵרַח לִבִּי]]).

(late) hasten, hurry (trans.), 2Ch 26:20 [[וַיַּבְהִלוּהוּ מִשָּׁם]] and they hurried him thence (‖[[נִדְחַף]]); make haste, sq. inf. Es 6:14 [[לְהָבִיא]] ´[[וַיַּב]] and they make haste to bring Haman.
